text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Ladies and gentlemen, the Aoharu Hai 
is about to begin!

The Aoharu Hai was a different kind of 
spectacle, which would run in parallel 
to the Twinkle Series.

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
This team competition, organized by 
Tracen Academy, emphasizes team 
play over individual ability!

This, however, wasn't an 
ordinary racing event!

text_block_list.name: Matikanefukukitaru
text_block_list.text:
We must save our academy from 
the crisis it faces!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hey, are we going to become heroes?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I… don't know if I can do it…

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text:
We can do it, together! 
Go, team… gooo!

text_block_list.name: Little Cocon
text_block_list.text:
Heh… If that's all it took to 
win, nobody would struggle.

text_block_list.name: Acting Chair Kashimoto
text_block_list.text:
—— Do you people think you 
can defeat my team?

The tumultuous team story surrounding 
the Aoharu Hai awaits!

The tumultuous team story surrounding 
the Aoharu Hai awaits!
